title: Nicodemus National Historic Site: Support Your Park
body: Support Your Park       You can get involved and show your support of Nicodemus National Historic Site by volunteering, or if you're interested in volunteering at any of the other 406 units of the National Park Service you can visit the NPS volunteer website. Click here to find a unit of the National Park Service. For additional volunteer opportunities visit volunteer.gov. Shop in our bookstore.  Be come a member of our supporting cooperating association Western National Parks Association. Join the Student Conservation Association (SCA) Follow the principles of "Leave No Trace" when you visit units of the National Park Service. Take part in the opportunity to "Find Your Park" and share your experiences as you explore national parks. You can show your support by making a donation directly to the site at the address below. Superintendent Nicodemus National Historic Site 304 Washington Avenue  Nicodemus, Kansas 67625 (785) 354-1489 ext. 230  Â     Archaeology field school June 3, 2009 NPS Photo
